#A SDK For http://rdpstudio.utools.club/bingpan  
How to use£º  
import£º  
    ```python
    from bpda.bpda import *
    ```
Get the specified date of bing background image address and print it to the console£º  
    ```python
     print(geturl("2020/04/18"))
    ```
full example code£º  
    ```python
    from bpda.bpda import *
     print(geturl("2020/04/18"))
    ```
